Fix: Add retry logic to handle race condition between webhook and extension

takes time to create tickets. This caused empty results.

- Extension now retries up to 5 times with increasing delays (1-5s)
- Added detailed timestamp logging to track timing issues
- Extension will wait for tickets to be created by webhook

This fixes the issue where QR codes don''t appear on thank you page.

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Increase retry attempts and delays to handle slow Shopify webhooks

Analysis showed webhooks take 25-30 seconds to process and create tickets,
but extension was giving up after 15 seconds.

Changes:
- Increased retries from 5 to 10 attempts
- Increased total wait time from 15s to ~45s
- Adjusted delay progression: 2s, 3s, 3s, 4s, 4s, 5s, 5s, 5s, 5s, 5s

This ensures QR codes appear even when webhooks are slow.

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
